error_type: Kulowetsa kuyenera kukhala kwa chingwe cha mtundu.
not_found: Palibe ntchito yotchedwa "}" idapezeka. \ N \ n \ n \ n \ n \ n {Zosankha]
call:
Imbani (Dzinalo, lembani = palibe, njira = palibe, POSTUT = 5, Starkitic = zoona)
Kusaka fayilo ndi dzina (komanso njira yosankha) mu foda yopatsidwa (kapena kuchokera ku cwd) kutsika pansi kenako pansi,
ndi katunduyo kutengera mtundu wake zokha.

Magawo:
    Dzina (STR): dzina lam'munsi la fayilo, popanda kuwonjezera.
    Lembani (STR, Zosankha): Kuvutikanso ('CSV', 'Json', 'XML').
    Njira (STR, Yosankha): Njira yoyamba yosakira.
    Nthawi (int, yosankha): Nthawi yosaka kwambiri mumasekondi.
    Okhazikika (bool, osankha): Ngati zowona, zimatulutsa cholakwika ngati mafayilo angapo okhala ndi dzina lomweli amapezeka.

Kubwerera: Zomwe zili pa fayilo yapezeka kapena ayi.
load_user_translations:
katundu_ser_translation (lang_path = "lang.jjson")
Zomasulira zotanthauzira zolembedwa kuchokera ku fayilo ya JSSS ndikuwaphatikiza ndi matembenuzidwe osakhazikika.

Magawo:
    Lang_path (STR, Yosankha): Njira yomasulira wogwiritsa ntchito. Zosasamala ku "Lang.jjjson".

Khalidwe:
    - Ngati fayilo ilipo ndipo ili ndi JDen, ikuphatikiza zomwe zili ndi matembenuzidwe osakhazikika
    - Ngati fayiloyo ilibe, imangokhala omasulira okha
    - amawonetsa machenjezo ngati fayilo ilipo koma siyingakhale yolemedwa
    - zosintha za _Translations Dictionary

Chidziwitso: Ntchito iyi iyenera kuyitanidwa musanagwiritse ntchito T () ntchito ya matembenuzidwe ogwiritsa ntchito kuti ichitike.
switch:
Njira yosinthira njira ya Python. MALANGIZO:
- makiyi angapo ofanana
- machesi ndi mtengo, mtundu, regex, lambada ntchito, kapena kalasi
- Chithandizo cha Mandasi ndi Nuny deta
- Kusankha kwa Async kuphedwa kwa milandu
- machesi onse ogwiritsira ntchito milandu yambiri
- Debug Mode kuti mulowetse milandu yofananira
async_switch:
Kukulitsa kuti musinthe mozama ku Async Mode. Magawo:
- Mtengo: mtengo wofanana ndi milandu yofotokozedwayo.
--* Izi zingaphatikizepo:
  - Fananitsani_all (Bool): Imbani milandu yonse yofananira m'malo moyimilira poyamba.
  - Debug (Bool): Sindikizani mlandu womwe umafanana ndi zomwe zidaphedwa.
  - Async_mode (bool): sayenera kupatsidwa pamilwer apa (nthawi zonse amakakamizidwa kuti akhale owona).
Chitsanzo: Asyncswitch ('Moni', Fat_All = Woona, Debug = Zowona) (...)
provide_file_path: Chonde perekani njira ya fayilo kuti muwone
file_ambiguous: Mafayilo angapo omwe atchulidwa kuti 'dzina lake}' opezeka: {Mitundu}. Fotokozerani mtundu kapena gwiritsani ntchito = zabodza.
t: Imabweza mawu omwe aperekedwa ndi chinsinsi choperekedwa chifukwa cha chilankhulo chosankhidwa.
show_gui_popup_description:
Imawonetsa zenera la Popup ndi zolemba komanso zowunikira.
Imagwira zonse ziwiri za CLI ndi Jupyster.

Mawonekedwe:
- Copy / Sungani magwiridwe antchito ogwiritsira ntchito
- Chiwerengero choyenera mu jupyester
- Kuyeretsa pawindo

Ziphuphu:
    Mutu (STR): Musilankhani
    zomwe zili (STR): Zolemba kuti ziwone bwino
    Mkuyu (matplotlib.figure.figure, osankha): Chithunzi chopangidwa
    chiwembu_chinjirongiction (yopunduka, posankha): ntchito yomwe imapanga chithunzi
    chiwembu_args (mwakufuna): Zosankha): mikangano pa chiwembu_zanjidwe
redundant_true: Kufanizira kufanizira ndi zoona, gwiritsani ntchito mtengowo mwachindunji
redundant_false: Kufanizira kufanizira ndi zabodza, gwiritsani ntchito 'osati' m'malo mwake
none_comparison: Kuyerekeza ndi palibe amene ayenera kugwiritsa ntchito 'ndi' m'malo mwa '=='
not_true_recommendation: Kugwiritsa ntchito '! = Zowona' osavomerezeka, lingalirani zosavuta
not_false_recommendation: Kugwiritsa ntchito '! = Zabodza' osalimbikitsidwa, lingalirani pogwiritsa ntchito mkhalidwe wabwino
help_usage: Gwiritsani ntchito thandizo ('ntchito_MENE') Kuti mumve tsatanetsatane wa ntchito inayake
help_error: Vuto: Ntchito '{}' silikhala kapena alibe zolemba
async_preview_not_available:
Chitsanzo cha Async sichingawonetsedwe mu mawonekedwe a syc.
Gwiritsani ntchito 'Idmbekezerani asyncswitch (...)' munthawi ya Async.
scatter_description: Amapanga chiwembu chomwaza chomwe mungawone pachibwenzi pakati pa mitundu iwiri mosalekeza.
lineplot_description: Imapanga mzere wa mzere woyenera kwa nthawi yotsatira kapena kulamula.
kdeplot_description: Amapanga Chiwopsezo cholongosoka pogwiritsa ntchito katswiri wa kernel.
violinplot_description: Imawonetsa kugawa kwa kuchuluka kwa deta m'magulu angapo.
pairplot_description: Timapanga maubwenzi apakati pa dataset akuwonetsa zophatikizika ndi zogawa.
lmplot_description: Zolemba ndi zizolowezi za mzere woyenera kukhala ndi chidaliro chokwanira.
jointplot_description: Kuphatikiza Stute Plat ndi histogram kapena KD minda pamadzi.
swarmplot_description: Amawonetsa zowonera zonse pamodzi ndi choyimira chogawidwa.
regplot_description: Zambiri za ziwembu ndi mtundu wosinthitsa wokwanira polnomial dongosolo.
barplot_description: Amawonetsa kulingalira komanso kulimba mtima monga makona akona.
stripplot_description: Njira yowonjezera yomwe imasinthana ndi gulu limodzi ndi Jitter kuti apewe kupitilira.
large_plot_note: Chidziwitso: Chiwembuchi chitha kutenga kanthawi kuti chitsimikizire chifukwa cha kukula kwake
get_moda_description: Amawerengera njira (mtengo wokhazikika) wa dataset. Imatha kubweza mtengo ndi chiwerengero chake.
get_media_description: Kuwerengera masamu (pafupifupi) a dataset. Amagwira matchulidwe a Nan osankha.
get_median_description: Amawerengera (pamlingo wapakati) wa dataset. Amagwira matchulidwe a Nan osankha.
get_rank_description: Kuwerengera mitundu (kusiyana pakati pa max ndi min) ya mzere wa deta.
get_var_description: Imawerengera kusiyana kwa mzere wa deta.
get_desv_description: Imawerengera kupatuka kwa mzere wa deta.
disp_description: Kubwezeretsanso magawo (osiyanasiyana, kusiyanasiyana, kupatuka kofanana) kwa mzati wa deta.
call_description: Zofufuza ndikuwerenga mafayilo osiyanasiyana (CSV, JSON, XML) ndi zosankha zosaka.
check_syntax_description: Kusanthula Python code ya zolakwika za syntax, mayina osadziwika, ndi nkhani zamawonekedwe.
exportData_description: Kutumiza kunja kwa matebulo oyambira ku mafomu osiyanasiyana (CSV, Json, XML, SQL, Exce, excel,).
addTable_description: Ikuwonjezera tebulo latsopano ku database ndi mizati yotchulidwa ndi zopinga.
mergeTable_description: Zophatikiza matebulo ambiri pogwiritsa ntchito mfundo za SQL ndi mitundu yosiyanasiyana yolumikizana.
join_description: Amachita SQL Senins pakati pa matebulo omwe ali ndi mitundu yolumikizana.
drop_description: Madontho owuma kuchokera ku database, posankha ndi scal.
cascadeDelete_description: Amachita kuchotsedwa kwa Cascade kutengera mkhalidwe, kusuntha kudalira.
recursiveQuery_description: Imapereka mafunso obwezererera pogwiritsa ntchito ziwonetsero zofananira (cte).
windowFunction_description: Imagwira ntchito pazenera (mode_number, udindo, etc.) kupita ku deta ya tebulo.
executeRawSQL_description: Imapereka mafunso opangira sql sql mwachindunji pa database.
show_description: Imawonetsa matebulo osungira ndi deta mu mawonekedwe ojambula.
hbar_description: Imapanga tchati chopingasa chopingasa ndi zilembo ndi mitundu.
vbar_description: Imapanga tchati cholumikizira cholumikizira ndi zilembo ndi mitundu.
pie_description: Amapanga tchati cha pie ndi zilembo zomizidwa, mitundu, ndi kuchuluka kwa kuchuluka.
boxplot_description: Amapanga bokosi lomwe likuwoneka kuti likuwunikiranso za data.
histo_description: Amapanga histogram kuti igawidwe kufalikira kwa mitundu yosiyanasiyana.
heatmap_description: Amapanga kutentha kwa kutentha kwa matrix-ngati matope okhala ndi mawonekedwe a utoto.
table_description: Imapanga chiwonetsero cha tebulo kuchokera ku data arrays kapena deta.
normalize_description: Imakhazikika pakati pa 0 ndi 1 pogwiritsa ntchito kukula kwa min.
conditional_description: Imagwira ntchito zomveka kuti mupange gawo latsopano mu deta.
convert_file_description: Sinthani mafayilo pakati pa mitundu yosiyanasiyana (shp, DBF, XML, ndi zina) ku CSV.
Switch_description: Kukhazikika kwa Synchroous Kukhazikitsa ndi makompyuta ambiri ofanana.
switch_description: Ntchito yodzaza ndi chilengedwe cha syntax kugwiritsa ntchito synchronous.
AsyncSwitch_description: Kukhazikitsa kusintha kwa asynchronous ndi makompyuta ambiri ofanana.
async_switch_description: Ntchito yodzaza ndi chilengedwe cha syntax kugwiritsa ntchito kusintha kwa asynchronous.
config_description: Kutanthauzira kwapadziko lonse kwa makonda a Module.
fig_to_img_description: Amatembenuzira matplotlib kukhala chithunzi chogwiritsira ntchito mafayilo ena.
format_number_description: Mapangidwe manambala okhala ndi malo osinthika ndi kuchuluka kwa kuchuluka kwa kuchuluka.
load_user_translations_description: Mafayilo omasulira otanthauzira ogwiritsa ntchito kapena omasulira kapena omasulira.
register_description: Wokongoletsani kulembetsa ntchito kapena makalasi mdziko lonse lapansi.
t_description: Ntchito yomasulira yomwe imabweza chingwe chomasuliridwa ndi kiyi yopatsidwa m'chinenerocho.
